title: Latest Veigar Win Rates

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body: Apparently the latest win rates for Veigar are in, looks like he is by far the lowest winning champ, coming in at a whopping 32.79%. I guess that "compensation buff" for removing DFG is working as planned.. If you guys think this wasn't a planned nerf to protect their LCS reel then you must not know riot. Even newbies can understand when you nerf his ult, remove his poke, increase his late game CD for Q, and nerf his stun. These are obviously nerfs, not compensation. Yes he did get mana upgrades that he needed and he will have much fun farming for 30 mins using it. Because he can't do anything else anymore. 32%... Are you kidding me? He was WELL below the top tiers in win % before this nerf. LCS protection, protect that reel! Next up, LB/Kat/Zed buff, cuz.. Reel!

Easy. Taric is garbage and is completely useless. Anything he does every other meta support pick does better. Also Taric has a pathetic mana pool on top of his abilities costing far too much mana to even use them. You wont ever have any mana in lane to use his stun because you will constantly be healing your ADC instead which costs even more mana.  On top of that his stun doesnt have very good range and Taric has such shitty base movement speed that he will be lucky if he ever reaches their adc to stun him. Even then Taric has surprisingly shitty base health stats and armor outside of his passive on W meaning he gets bullied out of lane extremely easy. Anything he offers other supports offer better. Annie has a much easier to use stun that can mass aoe stun an entire team. Soraka heals people for a lot more and has a global heal.

As for Katarina shes really easy to counter. In fact shes so easy its laughable. Literally the moment Katarina jumps into your team cc her and watch her melt. Literally any form of CC will cancel her ult which is her main damage output in team fights. On top of that her cooldowns are really fucking long and she literally has to get kills in order to really get going in a team fight. Meaning if you stop her ult and her follow up with literally any form of CC shes useless.

Now about Veigar's old mass aoe stun. It had extremely surprising range on it for one. Making it very hard to accurately judge where it was going to appear. Plus most times Veigar would just wait in a bush and as soon as somebody walks by mass aoe stun stuns 4 people and he does his full combo and the entire enemy team's carries are dead. If you want a good reason why Veigar's stun was so broken just got watch some of the recent LCK games in Korea. Hell actually just go watch the NA LCS game yesterday where Gravity picked Veigar support and shut down the enemy team from ever being able to do anything.

I don't know how people are supposed to adjust to obvious nerfs to both numbers and mechanics.. It's not the power shift Ahri had.

Q - Potentially buffed, both for farming and poke. Range buffed. Level 4/5 CD nerfed, but IIRC people started building Morello's after DFG was removed so not as bad as it sounds. (I could be way off base there; I don't play mages much.)

W - Straight buff. Numeric.

E - Decent in theory, bad in execution. I expect this to be buffed in the next two patches.

R - Mana costs and CD buffed. Honest question: how much was that extra 20% AP worth? He still does that extra 80% of target's AP as well.

20% ap on a champ that can easily hut 1000 ap in a 40 minute game is 200 damage he won't see again. Also you fail to realize how dependant veigar was on landing his stun, it is easier to hit cho gath's rupture than it is to hit veigar's dark matter and his cc now has a stupidly London delay. It's fine that they want him to have counter play and all but the killed what he can do to counter play his opponents. I say give him his old ratio back and decrease the delay to 0.5 and go from there

Q has not been potentially buffed, it has been a mana plus and a team play minus. You can no longer poke an enemy with it because he's smart enough to just sit behind the line which reduces his Q to a farming tool only. What other poke does he have after this is removed? His W? It doesn't land unless the player is stunned and you can no longer stun a player because they can simply walk away after the telegraphed location is given. 

W's straight numeric buff is worthless if your stun has been greatly nerfed.

R - 20% extra AP is a huge bonus when facing NON ap chars in game, which is usually about 60-80% of the characters in game.
